Our Menu

Chicken

A delicious selection of range free chicken: thighs, wings, breast. Enjoy with a range of sauces, including our signature Buffalo sauce. A side of fries or rice is included upon request.

Beef

Idulge in our delicious steak cooked to your preferance. Cuts include filet mignone, T-bone. Treat yourself to the spectacacular Japanese Wagyu with its signature ribbons. Side of roast vegetable and our signature sauce included.

Sushi

Prepared by our Master sushi chef, feel free to choose from a variety of hand rolled, maki, or nigiri sushi. We think simplicity is key when it comes to this dish, so we only use bluefin tuna and salmon for our recipes.
